alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Oneida; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 14 at 9:52AM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...PERIODS OF WINTRY PRECIPITATION WILL LEAD TO SLIPPERY TRAVEL CONDITIONS TODAY... Occasional light wintry precipitation will continue today. Most of the precipitation will fall in liquid form, but some sleet and wet snow could be mixed in at times. Air temperatures are expected remain near or just above freezing. This may allow some of the rain to freezing on elevated outdoor surfaces. Ground temperatures will be a little colder, so untreated roads, sidewalks, and parking lots will probably be icy. Use extra caution when walking outdoors or driving today. The precipitation is expected to change to snow this evening, then become much heavier during the late evening and overnight hours. Travel conditions tonight could become very difficult late tonight. Be sure to plan on a much slower than normal commute to school or work on Thursday morning.
